column11: Review Text

This is by far one of the best cooking classes in Sri Lanka. Our teacher Ruwini was so much fun. We really enjoyed making all of the different curries, breads, popadoms, salads and daal, before sitting down and enjoying our tasty hard work. Highly recommend!

We loved our time here! The host is lovely, and made sure to show us multiple different Sri Lankan cooking methods. She made us feel very comfortable and it was a really authentic experience. And the food was delicious! Would recommend to anyone visiting!

Amazing experience, food was super tasty and Ruwini was lovely. I am gluten free and I was at ease with a gluten free roti, curries and rice. Ruwini is very knowledgeable and gave us lots of tips. Best experience in Ella.

My husband and I had the pleasure of taking a cooking class at Honey Bee Garden during our visit to Ella, and it was absolutely wonderful! From the very beginning, we felt warmly welcomed by the chef, who was not only incredibly friendly but also passionate and joyful about sharing local cuisine. Throughout the class, we learned to prepare several traditional Sri Lankan dishes using fresh ingredients and authentic techniques. It was educational, fun, and very hands-on. Best of all: the food was delicious!
It has been a good experience! we had a great time. ruby is a crack! we will come back!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Rubi was a great host: learned authentic recipes, used local spices, and enjoyed a delicious meal. Then you eat with your friends and enjoy!
A great experience. Rubi is a great professional, with a lot of patience to teach us a large group of people. Sure we'll be back.

column8: Don't miss out on this experience!
column11: Amazing cooking class! Also very affordable. Can't recommend enough. We made some of the best food I ate on my trip. Ruwini made the class very informative and she is super fun.

This was the best cookery lesson I have ever done any where in the world. Our hostess Ruwini was amazing. She had all the ingredients ready for us to work with. We had the freshest of ingredients.. the array was magnificent and what a range of herbs and spices! We were shown how to cook a magnificent Sri Lankan meal from scratch. There were 4 in the group and we got to eat all we prepared. We were stuffed when we left! Come hungry! Such a truly enjoyable experience!

The cooking class was a great experience, learning different facets of Sri Lanka style cooking. Our host was fantastic, she explained everything very clearly and was very encouraging. Well worth trying this experience.

We loved our cooking experience with Ruwini!! Because we were with the three of us Ruwini told us a lot about her country, family and ofcourse the food! It is so nice to now know how to cook some of the typical dishes that you eat in the restaurants during your trip!
Very warm and welcoming teacher! She was very knowledgeable and humble. A must to try if you have time to spare in Ella!!!!

We booked on short notice on the recommendation of a couple we had met earlier on our trip. Communication with the hostess was very quick and easy and we booked a cooking class for 5pm. We prepared the food with four more and had a lot of fun. I can't believe how much you learn about Sinhalese culture and food in two hours. We prepared a lot of dishes (e.g. roti, daal, various curries, chicken, rice). The ingredients were all fresh and everything was explained very well. In addition, you were allowed to take photos of the ingredients of the individual dishes and in the end you get the recipes sent to you for recooking. The hostess explained really well and was very nice. At the end she organized us another TukTuk. Thank you for this great experience - 10/10!
The cooking class with Ruwini was fantastic! Friendly, sharing lots of knowledge of Sri Lanken cooking, fresh ingredients and delicious results. Highly recommend, thank you üôè

We loved our cooking course in Ella. We learned how to prepare and cook authentic  Sri Lankan food and about the ingredients. Very worthwhile and fun activity. Most importantly we got to eat it at the end! üòÅ It was delicious üòã looking forward to trying out the recipies at home. Thoroughly recommend.

Absolutely amazing cookery class. Not just making a few dishes, but a whole feast. Explaining all the different spices and ingredients and how they work together. Then how you can substitute others if needed. Ruwini was patient, clear and the class flew along. Then the highlight was eating it all! Brilliant
We wanted to do a local cooking class and we couldn't have found a better place. Ruwini was a  very good and patient instructor and the resulting food was simply delicious!

We joined a cooking workshop today with Rawini, and it was absolutely amazing! She was so patient and explained everything we were doing in such a clear and engaging way. The whole experience was super interesting, very professional, and so much fun. Highly recommended!

We were 5 people, my husband, children and niece and had a great time.  Ruwini has explained everything phenomenal and we got very rich food. A very good experience. We recommend that you enjoy this activity.
Amazing cooking experience with a group of 14 people and very tasty results from various curry, to Dhaka and coconut sambal ! Can highly recommend!

It was a very nice cooking class. Ruwini explained everything very well. She was very friendly.  Our daughter of 7 years old was able to help as well. The food was very nice. We received the recipes afterwards. We can really recommend this cooking class.

It was n warm welcome by the hostess. We learned a lot about Sr Lankan cuisine.  What a super guidance by Ruwini, so professional and friendly. And what a wonderful meal we had. Unbelievable what flavors.  Unforgettable!

We only had a cooking class for four as a family. Ruwini guided us step by step and introduced us to the culinary art of Sri Lanka. Even our teenage children had had fun cooking. I can recommend Ruwini‚Äôs cooking class to anyone who would like to learn how to prepare the delicious curries. We cooked 4 curries, dhal, roti, coconut sambal, etc. It all tasted very delicious. We will be happy to recook the recipes at home.

The cooking class with the fabulous Ruwini was an unexpected highlight during our visit to Sri Lanka! As a truly terrible cook, I was a little nervous to attend the class! And while it would take a lot of magic to make me a good cook, Ruwini made me feel like I was not quite as terrible as I thought! We prepared 5 dishes along with roti, rice and papadums and it was an incredibly fun experience. Ruwini shared beautiful stories and delicious recipes that I might even try myself when I get home (wish me luck!!) Thank you to Aruna from Blue Lanka tours for arranging this unforgettable experience and thank you to Ruwini for her hospitality, warmth and cooking skills!

This cooking class was a great experience and one of the highlights of our trip in Sri Lanka. Ruwini is a patient and kind teacher who explained all the recipes and how we could adjust them when we return home. We prefer more spicy food and she was able to accommodate for that amongst the small group of 6. We would recommend this class for anyone who is visiting Ella! Thank you Ruwini!

The food was amazing and we took so many photos during the preparation of the meals. We all really enjoyed the leadership of ruwini because she was really precise yet gentle with the different instructions she gave use.
What a way to spend a morning, topped off with the most delicious food. You have to try it! Learning the art, techniques and tasting amazing Sri Lankan, home cooked food

Our guide dropped us at Honey Bee for a cooking class where we were taught to make traditional Sri Lankan curries, roti and other accompaniments. The experience from start to finish was excellent, the tutor spoke excellent English and was very accommodating, the cooking was fun and afterwards we ate our curries with our guide. I would recommend this experience to anyone with an interest in cooking or adventurous appetite.

Amazing!! We heard about this cooking class from others so we went. Ruwini is a very fun lady. Her english is good and she is very clear. We made five different currys. The food was absolutely amazing and we had a great time. Absolutely a must visit!

We spent a beautiful morning in Ruina's kitchen, when we arrived we found all the ingredients ready, she explained what we would prepare and showed us all the ingredients and especially all the spices we would use. After just over an hour we put 7 or 8 dishes on the table, all very tasty and colorful. Good Ruini... and a little good us too
I had a lovely time learning to cook with Ruwini, she was super friendly, patient, and explained everything really well. The food was delicious üòã
Wonderful experience, dynamic and interactive. She is a very nice person and puts you at ease. We cooked Sri Lankan dishes in a fun way and choosing the amount of spices to use. Super approved!
Amazing place to do a cooking class in Sri Lanka. Very professional staff, clean and tasty dishes. A must to do in Ella! We had a very nice time!

A wonderful experience to learn how to prepare some delicious recipes. We enjoyed a lot, our teach was super nice and he speaks a very good English . At the end of the cooking class we tasted what we prepared. Everything was amazing!

Best cooking class in Ella! Ruwini was such a  wonderful and kind host and we had an incredible couple of hours making delicious food with her. We were very lucky to have a private cooking class with her, she walked us through all the steps, teaching us about the ingredients, the cooking methods and the history of the dishes. Truly a highlight of our trip to Sri Lanka, 100% would recommend!  We made so many traditional Sri Lankan dishes and they tasted so fresh and we couldn't have asked for more! Thank you Ruwini!!

Ruwini and her team were all excellent in providing an experience we will remember forever. The food and the education provided us so much knowledge and inspiration to continue making these dishes at home. Could not fault anything and will definitely be back.

Honey Bee Garden Cooking school was fantastic! We had such a fun morning and learnt so many new schools. Our teacher was helpful and very easy to understand, she made the lesson super fun. Another bonus was the food was delicious!! Thank you!

What an incredible cooking class! Ruwini is so lovely. She arranged a class just for the 4 of us at very late notice and was totally brilliant with my 8year and 10 year old. She got them involved in every step of the class and ensured they got stuck in. Beautiful fresh ingredients that we turned into curries, coconut roti, sambal and rice. We all sat and enjoyed the food we had cooked and it tasted AMAZING. I can not recommend this class enough. If you want a cooking class in Ella please book with Ruwini at Honey bee! 10/10!

To anticipate the result... we ate some local curries on our trip through Sri Lanka, but the Sri Lankan menu we were allowed to cook with Ruwini was by far the best of all. This can be due to the super-fresh ingredients, or the fact that you have cooked yourself or simply to Ruwini's kitchen art and clear instructions. Or maybe a little bit of everything. We had an entertaining time with interesting insights into and insights from Ruwini's kitchen, which we enjoyed very much in every respect. Thank you so much! Alex

Amazing experience! Roina is charming and patient, teaching the secrets of Sri Lankan cooking. Explains every ingredient, emotional and pleasant. The food is great!! It was really fun, nice, delicious and fun. Very, very recommended! We'll definitely get back when we get back to Sri Lanka. Thanks a lot.
Brilliant cooking class, would recommend to all! Even the dads :) The host was amazing, got everyone involved and her English was perfect! We all left with full bellies and recipes to try at home

The cooking class was fantastic! We booked the day before and were able to join the class in the evening. Ruwini was lovely, very knowledgeable about Sri Lankan cuisine, and was an excellent teacher. She explained everything as we went through the class and encouraged us to get our hands dirty, it felt like cooking at home with mum! We ended up making 4 different curries, rice and several sides + roti and papadums, it was all delicious and more than we could eat. Would very highly recommend to anyone interested in learning about Sri Lankan cooking.

We met Ruwini and she took us through the making of 7 dishes with our help taking part in chopping, preparing and cooking some examples of the national dishes. It was fun, educational, and friendly and we ended up chatting about all sorts of things afterwards while eating the food we had prepared. It was delicious and the best Sri lankan curry we had so far. Ruwini was such a lovely person we were both glad to have had the opportunity to enjoy the food with our driver Rohan !

The cook is really a super dear and open person who also speaks very good English. She explained everything great and gave us a lot of information. The food was incredibly good. Can only recommend it to everyone to take the cooking class in Ella! Also we loved that everything was vegan. the price has also been very fair with just under 5000 rupees per person
Wow, great place and experience. The lady running the place was very welcome, expleaing well all, the atmosphere was great. Eventually the food we cooked was very tasty
This cooking class was amazing !!! Rubini was a really good teacher. We were all quick and efficient and the meal was very tasty !!! The aubergine curry was very tasty

Amazing cooking! Pleasant atmosphere, explaining everything clearly, sending recipes later, and most importantly ‚Äì the most delicious Sri Lankan food I have ever eaten! It was a really, really, really good experience!

We had a great evening and a lot of fun in the kitchen! Food is traditional and super tasty. You are instructed by a chef. She is extremely organized, super friendly and competent. It‚Äôs an experience nobody should miss. Highly recommend this place.

A delightful experience on so many levels.  Ruwina is a warm, friendly and knowledgeable teacher who has nothing but patience for those of us who require significant handholding ü§ì.  She will also share her recipes because it‚Äôs amazing how deliciously successful our limited skills produced a super lunch for us and our guide and driver.  I wholeheartedly recommend adding this experience to your time in Ella!!!

What an experience! We were very lucky to have Ruiwini all to ourselves, being the only three who had booked that morning (the evening class was sold out!) so we were able to fully enjoy every process of the cooking. From making coconut milk, learning about spices, rolling breads, frying, stirring, chopping- we did everything! Ruiwini shared her knowledge of cooking and Sri Lankan food in a fun, informative and interactive manner. She is a wonderful woman to talk to and learn from. If you are thinning about booking an activity in Ella, please make time for this one. Not only do you learn, but you get to eat the incredible feast at the end of it. The food was delicious, we tailored it to our tastes (extra spicy for us) and enjoyed leisurely eating and chatting over our creations. You simply must go!!

We did a cooking class with our son, who has adhd/autism, and he totally loved this, we started everything from scratch, and the lady was so patient with him, explaining everything. The outcome (food) was absolutely lovely, and this gave my son an amazing confidence boost. It was also my birthday so we had a cake which our driver arranged. Lovely warm welcoming lady and excellent food. Thank you, Honey Bee, for topping off an amazing birthday üéÇ

Really enjoyed our class with Ruwini. Everything was prepared in advance and Ruwini provided very clear explanations of all the spices and how they work with different foods. We made 8 different dishes in an amazingly short space of time and all tasted delicious. We have learnt a few new tricks to try out when we go home. Thoroughly recommend.

A wonderful cooking workshop! Great Ravini, lovely teacher! Teaching clearly, fast! We challenged her not to want fried food and she took care of us for reasons accordingly! Her kitchen is clean, furnished! Enjoyed. It was delicious! Best meal we've ever had in Sri Lanka! Really recommended!!!! Thank you Ravi üôÇ

We had the great pleasure and luxury of enjoying this cooking class as a couple. Everything is super organized and the instructions very good. Everyone cooks along and the individual steps are super explained. We had great fun and the homemade curry tasted fantastic. Many thanks to our great teacher Ruwini Alex and Susanne

We had an amazing experience with Ruwini! We were lucky to be the only two people in the class so we got to know every step of every meal we did and had a lot of time to get all of our questions answered. We could definitely recommend the cooking class - it was so nice & interesting and the food was amazing!
Wonderful experience, it was a great time of sharing and cooking. If you want to take cooking classes in Ella, this is the perfect place. Many thanks to you
We were at a Sri Lankan cooking workshop. There was a good and pleasant atmosphere. Lovely and explaining face. Great experience. Food was delicious. Most recommended

We had a free night in Ella, so we were just browsing around Google Maps and found this place with so many good reviews. So we called and booked a class and now we understand the excitement. It was a truly awesome experience. We loved the class, the food was excellent, Ruwini is very friendly and we can‚Äôt wait to recreate some Sri-Lankan food at home ! üòç

We did the Honey Bee Garden Cooking Class on a free afternoon in Ella, and were glad we did. This was a great introduction to cooking Sri Lankan food. Ruwini's kitchen was spacious and perfectly set up for group cooking classes. The whole class was extremely well organized and clear. I am an experienced cook with restaurant experience, and I feel like I learned a lot in this class. Ruwini was also good at explaining the differences between South Indian and Sri Lankan cooking which was very helpful. The end result was a delicious meal that was by far the best one we had in Ella! This was an outstanding cooking class!

We had a wonderful experience at Honey Bee Garden. Our 7, 5 and 3yr old were so engaged when learning how to cook local Sri Lankan cuisine. What an education for them. And the food was absolutely beautiful, especially the aubergine and pumpkin curries. Ruwiny is a wonderful and patient host. This is such great value and a must do whilst in Ella.
Super organized cooking class and delicious food Very satisfied with the explanations and the way the class is made. I definitely recommend

I had never been to a cooking class before and I was nervous about it but Ruwini explained all the steps in a simple and easy-to-follow matter. We went as a group of friends and we all got to try cooking real Sri Lankan food. Despite the fact that none of us are particularly skilled cooks, the food turned out amazing and we had our fill of tasty food in the lovely outdoor space. Ruwini has also sent us the recipes of what we made so that we can try to recreate the dishes when we get home. Would highly recommend it for a fun night in Ella!

During our stay at Ella we participated in the cooking class all together as a family and we had a great time, we cooked very tasty dishes, the hostess very good and kind, I recommend this experience to everyone

Incredible cooking class in Ella, did a private with my parents and my boyfriend and could not have had a better time. By far the best food we have tried in Sri Lanka. If you want a local experience this is definitely the place for you. I really recommend this to anyone the most authentic experience
The cooking class was so perfect! Ruwini explained all very understanding and it was a lot fun with her. We made about 10 different meals in a very short time. Would totally recommend this place!

We really loved this cooking class. We have done a lot of cooking classes abroad when we go on holiday, and I think this was our favourite one. Ruwini is really kind and patient, she let us do all of the preparation and cooking ourselves. She is also really knowledgeable and gave good tips on how we could recreate these recipes in our own country. We made so much food, and it was all so delicious! There was no rushing for us to leave, we ended up eating and chatting for hours. We were also sent the recipes on pdf after the class. Thank you Ruwini!

WOW WOW WOW This was an amazing experience! Ruwini knows how to run a kitchen especially with 7 inexperienced foreigners on board. Learning to cook the Sri Lankan way was both eye opening and incredibly educational. Ruwini‚Äôs English is impeccable which makes everything that make easier and allows for a deeper understanding of the dishes being created. All in all we created 6 curries, rice, poppadoms, roti and coconut sambal. Bearing in mind that we did this in the middle of a torrential downpour and everything was set up to cater for this. This cooking class has become a highlight of our trip and I would recommend anyone thinking about booking this to stop hesitating and book the class!

The whole family (teenagers included) loved this, Rawini is an excellent teacher. We had fun, learned a lot and got to eat delicious food. Recommended. Rawini mentioned people were saying they had trouble getting in contact with her....just send a what's app message; +94 76 702 4983

We'd highly recommend to do this great cooking class! Ruwini gives really good information and instructions and it was really easy to follow. We learned a lot about Sri Lankan food, spices and the used ingredients, prepared a variation of different curries & sambol and everything that was prepared tasted fresh and absolutely delicious. Thank you for a great evening Ruwini (and Marianne & Nathaniel :)).
Great cooking class. Simple recipies using fresh ingredients. Delicious Sri Lankan food! Amazing and highly recommended
We were a group of 15 people and everyone loved it! We had so much fun cooking and the food was soooo delicious, totally recommend!

Absolutely amazing cookery class, all the ingredients were extremely fresh and the teacher was very friendly and made sure everyone was involved. We learned how to cook so many Sri Lankan traditional dishes then at the end all sat and ate the meal we had cooked together, would highly recommend 10/10!
Groovinis cooking class was amazing. Highly recommend it. Group of 16 attendees but she didn't stress one bit. Book with her!
Such a very good and welcoming experience, thanks! Fun, healthy and also vegetarian friendly! We enjoyed every single moment!!

Ruwini's cooking class is great. 6 different vegetable curries are made. Most of the ingredients were fresh from her garden. All participants can help. There was a lot of explanation, but also a lot of laughter.  Everything tasted very delicious üòã.
A typical Sri Lanka cuisine class with local products. Very attentive and effortful, a very well spent morning. We ate lunch what we cooked, which was super nice
Had a very nice cooking class at Honey Bee Garden, a curry, m and dahl made with delicious fresh herbs. Delicious fresh food and lovely woman teaching the lesson. Great!
Portugueses recomendo An experience to have in Ella. Very friendly, good English, cleanliness, and preparation of several delicious dishes. Good price, I recommend it.
Very good cooking class! Has all the attention and explains everything super well! Very friendly owner! The food is really great! You can really do everything yourself! Definitely recommended!!
Nice experience, very kind and patient lady. We ate dhal, fried eggplant, chicken curry and many other dishes, all delicious. Thank you so much

The best cooking class ever! We cooked the most AMAZING and delicious Sri Lankan meal! It was so interesting learning about the steps and processes involved in cooking these dishes. I had the best evening. Wish I could do it all over again! We‚Äôd love to come back one day! Thank you again so much!

The cooking class was great & the food even better! Highly recommend to book this class when visiting Ella! The host was very welcoming and provided detailed explanations on how to prepare the different dishes.

We had a wonderful time at this class, learning so much about the Sri Lankan cuisine. Our host was very knowledgeable and fun. The food we produced was some of the best we had in Sri Lanka. Highly recommend the Honey Bee Garden

Super recommend cooking class! Ruwyni was so nice and professional, we did everything in the process of making a true Sri Lankan meal. The meal was huge with so many options and it was actually so tasty! 10/10
Very nice workshop where everything was explained and we made everything ourselves (in a group of 3). Our reward at the end was top notch, perhaps the best meal we have had so far in Sri lanka!
100% recommend this cooking class! We had such a great time and enjoyed the food we cooked! Ruwini is really nice and a great teacher!
We had an amazing time with Ruwyini! We made a lot of Sri Lankan curries that all tasted delicious! Definitely recommend this cooking class when you‚Äôre in Ella

We had an awesome evening and probably the best sri lankan food during our whole trip! Everybody could take part in the cooking processes. She explained everything very clear and gave great insights of the typicial methods of sri lankan cooking. We can definitly recommend it and would love to do it again next time when we get back!! :)

Cooking class with Ruwini held for me and my family. I have two kids aged 10 and 5: Ruwini has been so kind, funny and patient with them! They still claim this has been their favourite experience in Sri Lanka. The food was delicious and we ate it all after the cooking class.

My girlfriend and I had a wonderful time at this cooking class. We were lucky enough to have a private class with Ruwini which was fantastic üòä She talked us through the many ingredients and techniques to make 6+ Sri Lankan dishes including two curries, roti, and sombal which were all delicious. This was one of the highlights of our time in Ella. Could not recommend a cooking class more!

We held a cooking class with the very nice ruwindi who also with a few words of Italian, explained various things about the local cuisine. We cooked 5 dishes and two loaves and then we ate them with taste!

A great time to share! Ruwini offers high quality cooking classes: very clear explanations, many recipes made all together in 1h30-2h with a friendly atmosphere... At the door, a meal of "chefs"! We were very proud of the meal we had prepared, one of the best meals of our stay! We really recommend this experience!

I was very lucky to join Ruwini's cooking class on short notice! It was an absolutely brillant experience. As a foodie and someone who loves to cook, I learned so much from her. The class was fun, very interactive, relaxed and Ruwini was a wonderful teacher. She showed us how to make coconut milk from scratch, how to use spices and balance flavors. Everything was made with the freshest ingredients and we ended up the class with a delicious, healthy, traditional Sri Lankan meal! I loved it! Also, the day after I received an email from her with all the recipes :) As soon as I got back home I made some of those dishes again in my own kitchen and they turned out great!

Super good experience from start to finish. The host was good at explaining, involving everyone and reminding to take pictures. We clearly got the feeling that we were cooking. The food was adapted to Scandinavian tastes, so it was not strong. Really cozy, educational and definitely worth a visit.

It has been a very pleasant and entertaining experience. We have spent about 2 hours learning to cook typical dishes of the country and then eating everything we had cooked. The hostess has been very close and friendly. We recommend it to anyone who wants to have a good time in Ella.

We had a great evening, cooking 7 curries, coconut sambal and mango chutney, all in 1.5 hours. Ruwini‚Äôs expertise and organisation kept us on track. My kids thought it was in their Top 3 Sri Lankan experiences. Best of all, we got to eat it at the end. Probably, the best Sri Lankan food we‚Äôve had all trip ‚Ä¶. And we cooked (with a little help).

Really good cooking class. Ruwinani was super cute and skillful. She explained us a lot about spices and she guided us to make different Sri Lankan dishes. We also made coconut milk from scratch. The warmest recommendations.

We had a wonderful time with Ruwini. We booked for 2 people and ended up having a private lesson. We learned so much and had all of our questions asked. The lesson was relaxed and good fun as we made jokes along the way. We made 7 dishes and learnt the building blocks for cooking sri lankan food at home. Amazing experience would recomened to anyone even if you are not a fan of cooking!
Everything was amazing!!! We really loved the experience and the food was so good!! I really recommend it!! It‚Äôs a nice way to now the local food

Rubini is very kindly, funny and an experienced cheff. I feel very lucky for to have the opportunity to go inside an authentic local kitchen. ü§ó It was one of my fovourite experience in Sri Lanka. Eva. Spain
Super sweet woman who gives great cooking workshops. We made about 6 different curries with our family. After cooking and eating you will be sent the recipes.

I attended the cooking class organized by Ruwini, the owner. Class starts at 5pm and takes place in the upstairs kitchen. I booked in the morning for the evening and was the only participant! Ruwini is a really good cook and teacher..very kind and helpful! We cooked traditional Sri Lankan vegetarian dishes based on spices and curries: aubergines, pumpkin, green beans, lentils and mangoes in addition to the classic rothi..everything was great and Ruwini follows you step by step. At the end of the preparations, dinner is served! I highly recommend if you want to have a different experience and know the flavors of this beautiful country!

Great experience to learn Sri Lankan cuisine. Communication is super simple due to its English which is top. The food is fresh and excellent. If you want to learn how to cook locally with fresh ingredients this course is for you. Do not hesitate to squeeze disappointed. Thank you very muchüôè

Awesome experience, incredible results! Our hostess, Ruwini, was patient and welcoming, and we got to cooking many different dishes at once, with fresh ingredients and fragrant home made spices. 10/10 would go again!

We had such a great experience learning to cook traditional Sri Lankan food here. The Instructor was so good and answered any questions we had and was so good at explaining the process. Such a great way to learn about Sri Lankan food and the way they live and cook. The food was really good as well. We made all vegan dishes and they were all amazing. Recommend to anyone coming to Ella!

What an incredible experience.  Ruwini teaches an amazing class!  She keeps the process super informative, hands on and fun.  The dishes she walked us though making were delicious and taught in a way that we can repeat at home.  Sri Lankan food is so tasty and this was one of the best meals we had during our trip.  Really excited to take what we learned home.  Highly recommend!

We had a great couple of hours in the hands of the expert chef Ruwini. We learned so much from her and got to eat the fruits of our labour. We also had a great group of other travellers which made the event even more enjoyable. Highly recommended.
The course was fantastic. It really opened my eyes on how the local meals are beeing made :). Her Restaurant just op the road is great, too.

This was the best meal we've had on our trip. Ruwini's knowledge of the flavours is unparalleled. She's very patient and her English skills are fantastic. The kitchen was well stocked and well prepped for the class. It took about 2 hours and we learnt all sorts, and had a delicious cooked meal at the end of it.
This was the most incredible cooking class - Ruwini is such a wonderful cook and person. The food we made was delicious and the staff are so, so friendly. Definitely worth a visit!

Had the most amazing class with Ruwini (our chef). She was so friendly and encouraged us to really get involved, trying lots of different cooking techniques. All the ingredients were fresh and lots of new spices to try. She even went and picked a jackfruit for us! We all ate what we had cooked together. Would highly recommend, 10/10!!

A fantastic afternoon of learning and cooking! Ruwini takes you through how to make all the dishes, which are all excellent and then shares the recipes when you leave. I have already cooked so many at home. An enjoyable evening cooking with new people and a great instructor. I recommended a friend to go the next day and they had the same experience! 10 out of 10!

We did the cooking class with Ruwini and it was amazing! She explained everything very well and also gave us great alternatives to recreate the stuff at home! Very interesting and lovely experience ‚ò∫Ô∏è Can only recommend!!

Ruwini was such a lovely hostess!! It was such a big pleasure meeting her and learning how to cook Sri Lankan food with her, she explained everything in details. After the cooking class you can enjoy the delicious food. A must when you‚Äòre in Ella! Thank you so much Ruwini - it was delicious!

Ruwini is a very lovely hostess. She explained everything wonderfully and gave us the opportunity to do it ourselves. The food she cooked was incredibly delicious and the best thing is that she gave us the recipes to try out.
Great experience! The instructions were great, clean facilities, great food was cooked by us! Would definitely recommend.
We had a really nice experience! It was super delicious, great ambiance and very hands on. She is very nice and speaks very good english

Best experience of Sri Lanka! The cooking class was so fun and informative. We made a huge range of curries in only a couple of hours, and then got to eat them for dinner. They were so delicious; the best meal I‚Äôve had on my trip! If you do one thing in Ella, do this class!
The host was amazing, brilliant English and really enthusiastic about the cooking. I strongly recommend it to anyone visiting ella and make sure you come hungry!

This was the best cooking class I‚Äôve ever done! We made coconut milk from scratch, even cracking open the coconuts ourselves! I saw one of them - it was nice and clean, included a fan and there is WiFi on the property. I would certainly recommend it. Ruwini - thanks again and we wish you all the best, you deserve it!

we initially wanted to do the cooking class in the spice garden but there was none on the day we were in ella. so we took this class because of the amazing reviews. they were not exaggerating. it was my friend, me and two other people. we called 2 hours before the class started and still got to do it. she was so nice and welcoming. at the beginning she asked us what our favourite sri lankan meal was so far.  then she proposed to make that aswell as the planned dishes. we could crack some coconuts ourselfs, make the roti dough,... she gave us so many tips on how to make the dishes back at home with the local ingredients there. she will even send us the recipes via email. we made 8 vegan dishes in total. they were delicious. i definitely recommend this place.
We participated in the cooking class with the owner which was really nice and explained everything in English. The food was great but we hoped to take a bigger part in the preparation.
Excellent cookery class - hands on, informative well paced and most importantly great Sri Lankan food with Ruwina who clearly has a passion for good home cooking. Great value too. Thanks!!!
Thanks Ruwini for the excellent cooking class. We tried the recipes at home. Great to enjoy all these lovely dishes at home. Precious memory!

The cooking class was held by the lady of the house. She taught us step by step how to cook 8 different Sri Lankan dishes. She also gave advice for European substitutes or alternative dishes. It was an amazing experience and I'm looking forward to try these dishes in Belgium!

After a little research in Ella we came by Ruwini, which made our stay in Ella 100% perfect. Ruwini told us everything about the Sri Lanka kitchen and all its secrets. We got to know all the ingredients and had a lovely time chatting in the kitchen. After preparation we had the best dinner we could wish for! This is the best place in town if you want to learn more about the Sri Lanka kitchen and taste the best prepared meals! Ruwini is the best host!

We are a family of five who just returned from Sri Lanka. Ruwini gave us the ultimate culinary experience in her kicten, with us cooking local dishes such as perfect Rice, Spices, Dhaal, Coconut Sambal, Fish Curry, Aubergine Modju, Bean curry, Roasted potatoes, Coconut Sambal, Poppadoms and Cucumber salad. A wonderful Sri Lankan experience which can be highly recommended.

I'd highly recommend a lesson with Ruwini, she's so warm and friendly and is an excellent cook! We had our lesson as a group of 6, such incredible  value for money as she really gets you involved and you have ample food to sample for dinner. Beautifully laid out in her homey kitchen, she explains all the local ingredients and encourages you to try as you go along, and take photographs of the cooking as you wish. We learnt a selection of curries - green beans, beetroot, daal - plus tempered potatoes, papadom, fragrant rice, aubergine mojul, pol symbol and cucumber salad. All were incredible, Ruwini even asked for any special requests and added in the beetroot curry for us. The lesson was at a great pace so that you can easily keep up and take notes if you wish. All for 2000LKR per person which is great value. Once all the cooking was done we all sat down together to enjoy the meal. And we're given big wedges if watermelon for desert. In total we were there for four hours, which flew by as it was such a fun evening.

The cookery school was fantastic and Ruwini is so knowledgeable of the ingredients and skillful at putting them together - she's also good company. I turned up for a cooking lesson while my wife went for a massage - this amused Ruwini quite a lot. She said I would make a good husband in Sri Lanka!! We cooked (for a couple of hours) some of the best tasting dishes I've had in SL. I told Ruwini to tell my wife that I had cooked everything - the trouble is I'm not sure if I can replicate this back in England. Hope you are well Ruwini - thanks again for a great evening of cooking and eating. Love Keith and Suzanne.

We did a cooking class with Ruwini and learned all basics to start cooking Sri Lankan. She was very friendly, patient and explained all basic and necessary things. Definitely worth to do that course. The price included & self-made dinner is so delicious, hope we'll manage to do it half as good at home! Thank you :)

Our class at Honey Bee Garden was one of our highlights in Sri Lanka. If you're looking for an informal and delicious class, this is perfect. The class was 2 hours followed by dinner and we made a mix of different curries and sides including fresh coconut sambal which was our favourite!  I couldn't recommend this class more, the food was outstanding!

Our family did the cookery class with the lovely Ruwini and she cooked us a plethora of amazing vegetarian dishes (Aubergine, green beans coconut sambal, potatoes, Dhaal, eggs) as well as a tomato salad, rotti and rice. She was so kind and informative and the food was sooo delicious, best food we had in Sri Lanka, everything made from scratch and with love. We ate it all up as  our lunch. You must go !!!

The cookery classes take place in the private kitchen of the "Honey bee garden". They also offer some rooms. Our driver suggested this place,  even if our travel specialist had us booked into a class in the 98 acres resort where we stayed. It was definitely more authentic, the kitchen with original open fireplace to keep things hot. The chef speaks perfectly English and to ensure also vegetarians can attend, all curries and side dishes were veggie. The food you will enjoy to eat at the end of the lesson was just delightful. Some of the ingredients you will hardly be able to buy abroad, we asked our driver to organise these during our journey.

I arrived in Ella this afternoon in the pouring rain and decided on a whim to inquire about a cooking class from my hotel. They called Ruwini at Honey Bee Garden around 2:30 or 3pm, and she said she'd teach a solo class at 6:30. She taught me about the different spices, gave tips on cooking techniques, and shared my love of food and cooking. Though the class was less hands-on than some other classes I've taken, Ruwini explained in detail everything she was doing and let me try a few things and even took my photo. Plus, I was too busy scribbling down notes! We made papadam, aubergine modju, dhal curry, green bean curry, steamed rice with spices, cucumber salad with coconut milk dressing, and tempered potatoes. Easily the best food I've had so far on my trip. Everything is fresh, and she even makes her own spices. Her English is excellent, and she's an adept conversationalist. I cannot recommend her highly enough! If you're in Ella and have a spare moment, or if, like me, you're caught here in hours of rain, do yourself a favor and head on over to Honey Bee Garden!

Booked rather on the spur of the moment but a fabulous experience just 4 of us in the class and we were keen to learn how to make garlic curry and it was added to the repertoire. Class lasted well over 2 hours and we enjoyed eating our veggie curries in the beaut garden. Excellent teaching and with her excellent English this was a fabulous experience and I can't recommend highly enough. Man thanks Irena and Bernie

I was just two days in Ella and I stayed in the Honey Bee Garden. The Rooms are clean ,my bad had a good mattress, typical srilankan breakfast, and the most important fact for me was to find a quite place....especially at night..in the garden is lost to see, birds, herbs, sweet fruits...also the place is really good loceted, if you want to see the little Adams peak and the demodara nine arch bridge. The homeowner is a great men to talk with....don¬¥t miss it...I will came back one day to see the beautiful views...Andre

I took a cooking class at Honey Bee Garden Restaurant and it was amazing!!! Ruini, the teacher, is a very friendly person and an excellent chef!! She taught us how to do six (!) different curries, as well as roti, papadam and coconut sambal. She speaks very good English and knows a lot about cooking and the ingredients and happily told us about it. The food was the best I've eaten on the whole two and a half weeks trip through Sri Lanka!! An overall awesome experience, which I highly recommend!

Myself and 2 other girlfriends did a cooking class here at the honey bee garden. The teacher was such a lovely, passionate and patient women. She taught us how to cook 5 different curries as well as coconut roti! Everything was so delicious and we will definitely try to recreate the dishes at home! It was such a homey feel and i highly recommend the honey bee gardens cooking class if you're looking for an Intimate, detailed and delicious cooking class!

We had a wonderful stay in the quiet guest house and had a great evening preparing many delicious sri lankan dishes with the best cooking teacher ever! The food was so delicious! Kindness and "savoir faire", the best ingredients for an unforgettable moment. Thank you!
Go and take the cooking class!  The woman is wonderful, allows and encourages participation, and is truly kind.  The best meal I had in Sri Lanka!

We had a wonderful stay! It's such a nice and calm place, a beautiful room and supernice people. We man of the house was so friendly, made us a nice breakfast every morning, gave lot's of tips and we were happy having followed the cooking class. Since coming back to Belgium, we've made the Sri Lankan rice and curry for friends and they were all overwhelmed! Very recommend place to stay!

We had two wonderfull days in Ella. Clean room with a wonderful garden. Location is in a quiet area. Hostfamily is very friendly. They helped us to organise trips in Ella and prepared us our best breakfast in SriLanka with homemade honey...

We did this cooking class with a group of 10 girls at Honey Bee Garden. We all absolutely loved it and we would really recommend this to other groups/couples! The teacher is a lovely woman who lets guests cook in the kitchen of her own house. Her hospitality, her home, family and kitchen, and of course the food were fantastic. Even without electricity she managed to let us prepare many dishes: the power disability actually had a nice charm to it. We made a variety of different curries, dahl, rotties, vegetable pots, salad, papadum. We cooked with all homemade spicemixes, fresh herbs, and a lot of fresh coconut (oil, water, milk, flakes). After hours in the kitchen, cooking and learning about all the different ingredients, we sat in the garden to eat our dishes. It was a great night for us. The best dinner we had in Sri Lanka! Thank you so much for your hospitality! Marije, Marloes, Teppie, Clarice, Fleur, Anne, Caro, Lisa, Inge and Maja from the Netherlands

We didn't stay at the Honey Bee Garden but we took part in a cookery course. We found the experience very enjoyable. We prepared around 8 dishes that made up a Rice and Curry style meal including an excellent aubergine curry. We also learnt how to make Roti and coconut sambal. The course lasted around 2 hours and we then sat down to a delicious banquet of all the food we had freshly prepared with our teacher and everything was excellent. Our teacher spoke excellent English and was friendly and knowledgeable she gave us an excellent insight into traditional sri lankan cookery methods.

Had an excellent lesson today with my family in cooking Sri Lankan food.Presented by a very friendly lady who was very patient with my kids and answered all our questions. Her kitchen was prepared and neatly laid out,we're the individual ingredients that we would be cooking  with as well as utensils. We were show  how to prepare and cook a number of vegetarian dishes including Lentils,Aubegerine Curry, Coconut rotti, green beans curry and tempered potatoes. I do Cook basic Sri Lankan curries but learnt a lot during this lesson about the preparation of these curries. And we got to taste what we made at the end. Would fully recommend you doing this lesson, if you want to get into cooking Sri Lankan food!
Thank you for all ! Very cosy place and nice owners ! The garden is beautiful, it was pleasant to take breakfast there. The owner was helpful to explain what to visit in Ella.

During our two nights stay in Honey Bee Garden Homestay, which by the way was one of the best Guesthouses we've had on our 3 weeks backpacking trip through Sri Lanka, we did the cooking class at Honey Bee. We made 6 vegetarian curries with fresh veggies from the market and herbs from the garden. Tha lady was absolutely amazing, she told us a lot about Sri Lankan food in general (not only about the dishes we prepared this night) and as a former chef of her own restaurant there couldn't be a better teacher! The price was absolutely reasonable, even if you're only two! We liked everey single dish we made and we are looking forward to cook them again by ourselves.

Visited this gorgeous garden and took a cooking class with my wife.  Payed a reasonable price for two and half hours of enjoyable cooking and learning the Sri Lankan cousin. The lady who taught us was lovely,  had great English and had lots of patience. We made a variety of the Sri Lankan food such as Dahl curry,  rotti, coconut samban, there special eggplant dish ect. Highly recommended visiting this place if interested in learning how to cook and use their ingredients.
